title: Five-Star Brussels Escape
description: Experience luxury in the capital of the European Union, waffles and world-renowned chocolate, staying at one of Brussel’s grandest hotels, Steigenberger Wiltcher, located on one of Brussel’s most prestigious and expensive streets, Avenue Louise, right in the heart of the city. Stay three nights and enjoy daily breakfast, welcome drink on arrival and a welcome amenity waiting in your room.

title: Stay in the Heart of Belgium’s Capital
description: Experience the architecture, waffles, chocolate, beer, fashion and culture of Belgium’s capital city with three nights at Martin’s Brussels EU. Includes a welcome beer or wine each, daily buffet breakfasts, a bottle of water each and complimentary Wi-Fi.

title: Brussels City Break near Airport with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description: Immerse yourself in the glory and beauty of the Grand Place, and feel yourself getting lost in the intricate details of the city with a getaway to Crowne Plaza Brussels Airport, an IHG Hotel. Positioned minutes from the airport and train station, spend your days devouring traditional Belgian waffles and double-fried frites or admiring the playful art that decorates the city’s streets. Unwind with a delectable, effervescent Belgian beer or wholesome plate at Craft restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Brussels Airport, an IHG Hotel

vendor_name: Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Place Rouppe
title: Boutique Elegance in the Heart of Brussels with Daily Breakfast
description:
Feel at home in the centre of Brussels thanks to Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Place Rouppe, where timeless elegance and sophisticated luxury combine in a recently renovated neo-classical building. Surrounded by some of the capital’s best bars and restaurants and just a short walk from the UNESCO-listed Grand Place and Manneken Pis landmark, this boutique bolthole is perfectly placed for hours of strolling through Belgium's capital.

With a name like Pillows, the bedding in the hotel’s luxurious rooms was always going to be high on the plush scale. Paired with shades of grey and original artworks on the walls, each space is a masterclass in classic contemporary styling. This aesthetic approach continues in the hotel’s restaurant, The Living - Resto & Winebar, where the concept of ‘all-day’ is taken literally - midnight feasters, jetlagged breakfasters and afternoon snackers can pop down to the cosy-chic space any time of day (or night!).
location_description: Pillows Grand Boutique Hotel Place Rouppe

vendor_name: Pillows City Hotel Brussels Centre, Brussels
title: Central Brussels Boutique Stay with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drink
description:
Discover the beating heart of Brussels with a stay at the contemporary-yet-classic Pillows City Hotel Brussels Centre. Just a 10-minute walk to some of the city's most iconic attractions, including the Grand Place, the boutique luxury hotel is spectacularly situated for days and nights exploring. Sample local delicacies, learn a little more about Belgian history and keep an eye out for Manneken Pis - the city’s cheekiest mascot.

Rooms and suites are refined yet relaxed, with small touches that demonstrate attention to detail. Spend your days exploring Brussels’ diverse attractions before dropping by The Living Lounge & Bar, where clockless dining means you can snack any time of day - or night. Retire to your room to sink into the marshmallow-soft bedding - with a name like Pillows, it was always going to be remarkably comfortable.

title: Brussels Urban Garden Retreat with Farm-to-Table Restaurant
description: A stone's throw from the leafy oasis of Brussels Botanical Gardens is the arty and cutting-edge Hotel Indigo Brussels - City, an IHG Hotel. Spend your days in style at SERRA, an eco-conscious restaurant with an emphasis on organic, farm-to-plate dining. This all-day, slow-dining venue is resplendent with hanging plants, velvet and leather upholstery and floral-themed wallpaper - it's a feast for all senses. Meanwhile, the Urban Fitness centre features a fully equipped gym and a steamy sauna.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Brussels - City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Place Charles Rogier 20, 1210 Brussels, Belgium, Brussels, Brussels, Belgium, 1210
